name: Wagner
title: Wagner, Blacksmith
desc: "Smithing is not dependent on brute strength. You need the sweat on your brow from constant hard work, and perseverance stronger than the metals we forge!"
in_play_description:
End Phase: Gain 1 Forging Billet.
When playing a Weapon Card from your hand: If possible, spend Forging Billets equal to the total cost of the Weapon and equip this Weapon for free. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for accepting Wagner's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
